page.title: 10LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Here are some of the games played by children at Landulph School during lesson breaks at mid-morning,lunchtime and mid-afternoon. Red Letter.The game starts with a number of children with their backs to a wall,facing a single child who is also backed to a wall.The idea is to cross the space inbetween by jumps without jumping when the red letter,nominated at the start, is called. Ball It.The game starts when someone is chosen to be IT.The person who is IT has a ball and has to throw it at the other players.If they are hit they become IT and have to throw the ball. Urki. This is the name of someone who counts to 200 while the others run off to hide. When Urki leaves the Urki Post to look for them they have to try and touch the Post before being seen .
